pages.text: $(br)Drain your Allomantic reserves. $(br)$(br)$(br)$(br)$(br) Bonus: $(br) - The greater the reserve you consume, the greater the probability of removing other adverse effects.

pages.title: Interacciones
pages.text: $(br) + Duralumin: Nothing $(br2) + Lerasium: Nothing $(br2) + Both: Nothing
